content: super squishy brioche knit with bulky yarn makes this instant knitting gratification this headband will keep your ears toasty warm on those cooler fall days a great piece if you tend to wear your hair up or dislike wearing hats use different yarn weights and needle sizes to create different sizes headbands for the whole family a worsted weight yarn with us 9/5 5mm needles will yield a newborn sized headband a great video tutorial for brioche knitting by hands occupied 1 it ll help you understand how you start each row with a yarn over and how to knit the set up row **skill level ** advanced beginner **finished measurements ** 18 /46cm circumference 4 5 /12cm tall unblocked **yarn ** super bulky **yardage ** 50 - 60 yards **shown in ** lion brand thick & quick **needles ** us 11/8mm straight needles **notions ** scrap yarn crochet hook tapestry needle 1 http //www handsoccupied com/2014/10/brioche-knitting/
